# Contextual Analytics SaaS

> A multi-tenant platform for managing hierarchical assets and integrations with real-time analytics.

## Core Documentation
- [Project Overview](file:///work/dev/git/zabe/analytic/AI_CONTEXT.md)
- [Modules Guide](file:///home/ideilson/.gemini/antigravity/brain/94e82879-ec85-47b9-9325-28165dc9e79e/MODULES_GUIDE.md)
- [Database Schema](file:///home/ideilson/.gemini/antigravity/brain/94e82879-ec85-47b9-9325-28165dc9e79e/DATABASE_SCHEMA.md)
- [Frontend Guide](file:///home/ideilson/.gemini/antigravity/brain/94e82879-ec85-47b9-9325-28165dc9e79e/FRONTEND_GUIDE.md)

## Key Concepts
- **Multi-tenancy**: Workspace ownership and isolation via `workspaceCode`.
- **Hierarchy**: Recursive Space model (Department -> Area -> Line).
- **Real-time**: AdonisJS Transmit (`BroadcastService`) triggers updates.
- **Frontend**: Inertia.js protocol serving Vue 3 components.
